synopsis.text:
Nanachi Takeo, a college student with dormant supernatural abilities, and Fuzuchi Kuraki, a reserved high school student endowed with immense psychic powers, form an unlikely duo bound by an ancient sword capable of severing souls. Together, they embark on a quest to uncover mystical artifacts in the realm of Izumo, the cradle of Japanese mythology.

As they delve deeper into the arcane world, they unravel a web of secrets and make astonishing discoveries. Kuraki, armed with his ancestral blade, finds himself inexplicably drawn to a captivating shrine maiden during the Shinnagi festival. As the night unfolds, the maiden is revealed to be Nanachi, the son of the guesthouse owner where Kuraki resides.

Their bond strengthens as they discover their shared ability to perceive spirits and harness the ancient magic of Izumo. However, their journey takes a perilous turn when Kuraki inadvertently witnesses a forbidden ritual aimed at breaking the curse of Susanoo. Consequently, he becomes the target of the newly appointed and ruthless leader.

Join Kuraki and Nanachi as they navigate the treacherous world of ancient magic, unearthing secrets and facing challenges that test their resolve and friendship.
